title: vaittapaDiyE
sahitya:
vaittapaDiyE iruppAi paramashivan malaraDi tannai ninaippAi manamE nI


anupallavi

  attan en ANDavan ambalat-tirukkUttan aTTa mUrtiyin aruL iTTappaDikkE unnai


caraNam    uLLattil aDangAmal UrellAm tirindenna Urukku paghaTTagap-pErukku vAzhndenna
teLLiya cittamum sIriya bhaktiyum dhyAna mOna japamum gAna pUjaiyum sheidE
